text: Ani tyanna tya divasaci athavana karuna dya, jya divasi allaha tyanna (apalya samora) asa sthitita ekatra karila ki (tyanna vatela) ki (jagata) divasaca eka ardha ksana rahile asaveta ani apasata ekamekanna olakhanyasathi ubhe asatila. Vastavika hanigrasta jhale te loka, jyanni allahajavala janyala khote tharavile ani te margadarsana prapta karanare navhate
